Paragraph: These results demonstrate that the 4,9bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)naphtho [1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene is a promising versatile core unit for developing high - performance OFETs and polymer solar cells.

| Material Name |

| 4,9bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)naphtho [1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene |

* 4,9bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)naphtho [1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene

This is a single entity, presented in the paragraph as a promising versatile core unit for developing high-performance OFETs and polymer solar cells.

* "OFETs" (this is an abbreviation for "organic field-effect transistors" and does not refer to a material name)
* "polymer solar cells" (this is a type of device that uses organic materials, but does not refer to a specific material name)
